mapper.select: SELECT j.*, a.name account_name, p.name project_name FROM journal j, account a, task t, project p where UPPER(j.document_type) = UPPER('task') AND j.document_id = t.id AND j.account_id = a.id and t.project_id = p.id and t.project_id = #{project_id} UNION SELECT j.*, a.name account_name, p.name project_name FROM journal j, account a, risk r, project p where UPPER(j.document_type) = UPPER('risk') AND j.document_id = r.id AND j.account_id = a.id and r.project_id = p.id and r.project_id = #{project_id}
